home.aboutMe: I'm a Software Development Technician with a degree from CESDE and a student at ITM. I'm passionate about programming; when I write code, the hours always fly by without me even noticing.
home.description: I speak English, enjoy reading, and always strive to create well-structured and clean websites. I'm very curious and ready to learn everything I need to excel and get hired as a developer.
home.aboutPage: This website is a personal presentation developed with React, where I showcase my technical skills, links to my professional networks, and a summary of my profile.
home.aboutPageB: It was created as a personal project to practice front-end development, modular organization with components, and data management through JavaScript files.
home.firstText: General information and redirection to any option in the Networks section.
home.secondText: There are previews, redirects to my web pages, and a bit of my backend projects.
home.thirdText: My certificates from Platzi and other studies
